other_tests.findings: Superficially invasive well-differentiated squamous cell carcinoma.
Margins did not show evidence of cancer.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Final pathological examination showed extensive involvement of the mandible to the lateral margin.

other_tests.procedure_name: Right partial glossectomy and ipsilateral neck dissection
other_tests.findings: Carcinoma extending to the lateral margin.
